biotools.summary: alona is a web-based bioinformatics service designed to analyze single cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) data. It is an analysis framework for single cell RNA sequencing data (scRNA-seq) and enables exploratory analysis through a set of Python modules. adobo can be used to create analysis pipelines, facilitating analysis and interpetation of scRNA-seq data.
